name: Lintu Gem
description:
In this game you play as a curious bird. When you start seeing green things all over the place you have to go and investigate. 

The only thing is there are others around you who don't like seeing you out and about.

Try and grab as many gems as you can before you're picked off by something flying through the air or sliding on the ground.

This game was made in Godot to get some of the basics down. More games to come!
